Room.Name: Amberton Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking down a rather unsafe section of Amberton Lane.
Room.LongDescription: On the east side of the road are a number of small temples and shrines dedicated towards some of the goblinoid and other non-humanoid dieties. Directly to the east is the Temple of Hruggek, the dominant god of the bugbear pantheon. Hruggek is a relatively passive diety, not actively involved in the everyday work of the bugbear clans.
